00282 static inline int xnpod_get_qdir (xnpod_t *pod)
00283 {
00284     /* Returns the queuing direction of threads for a given pod */
00285     return testbits(pod->status,XNRPRIO) ? xnqueue_up : xnqueue_down;
00286 }
00287 
00288 static inline int xnpod_get_minprio (xnpod_t *pod, int incr)
00289 {
00290     return xnpod_get_qdir(pod) == xnqueue_up ?
00291         pod->minpri + incr :
00292         pod->minpri - incr;
00293 }
00294 
00295 static inline int xnpod_get_maxprio (xnpod_t *pod, int incr)
00296 {
00297     return xnpod_get_qdir(pod) == xnqueue_up ?
00298         pod->maxpri - incr :
00299         pod->maxpri + incr;
00300 }
00301 
00302 static inline int xnpod_compare_prio (int inprio, int outprio)
00303 {
00304     /* Returns a negative, null or positive value whether inprio is
00305        lower than, equal to or greater than outprio. */
00306     int delta = inprio - outprio;
00307     return testbits(nkpod->status,XNRPRIO) ? -delta : delta;
00308 }
00309 
00310 static inline int xnpod_rescale_prio (int prio)
00311 {
00312     return xnpod_get_qdir(nkpod) == xnqueue_up ?
00313         nkpod->minpri - prio :
00314         nkpod->maxpri - prio - 1;
00315 }

00317 static inline void xnpod_renice_root (int prio)
00318 
00319 {
00320     xnthread_t *rootcb;
00321     spl_t s;
00322 
00323     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock,s);
00324     rootcb = &nkpod->sched[xnarch_current_cpu()].rootcb;
00325     rootcb->cprio = prio;
00326     xnpod_schedule_runnable(rootcb,XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO|XNPOD_NOSWITCH);
00327     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock,s);
00328 }

00466 static inline void xnpod_lock_sched (void)
00467 {
00468     spl_t s;
00469 
00470     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock,s);
00471 
00472     if (nkpod->schedlck++ == 0)
00473         __setbits(xnpod_current_sched()->runthread->status,XNLOCK);
00474 
00475     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock,s);
00476 }
00477 
00478 static inline void xnpod_unlock_sched (void)
00479 {
00480     spl_t s;
00481 
00482     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock,s);
00483 
00484     if (--nkpod->schedlck == 0)
00485         {
00486         __clrbits(xnpod_current_sched()->runthread->status,XNLOCK);
00487         xnpod_schedule();
00488         }
00489 
00490     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock,s);
00491 }
